SEARCH
Package gw.api.database

Interface QueryHint

All Known Subinterfaces:
TableQueryHint
public interface QueryHint
Adds a hint to a query. Note that a hint may not be used if it is added to the wrong containing object, e.g. an AfterSelect hint will not apply if added to the Table object returned by a join because there's no select because of the join. An AfterSelect hint will apply to a subselect, e.g. ... IN (SELECT ...). SQL Server: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms187713.aspx - 3 places - Query: after the entire query string. - Join: inside the JOIN keywords. E.g. INNER LOOP JOIN - Table: after the join with the table. E.g. UPDATE MyTable WITH (TABLOCK). E.g. SELECT * FROM Table1 AS t1 INNER JOIN Table2 AS t2 WITH (FORCESEEK) ON t1.T2ID = t2.ID Oracle: http://docs.oracle.com/cd/B12037_01/server.101/b10752/hintsref.htm - Always in comments after the SELECT keyword: /*+ hint1 [text] hint2 [text] ...[[END COMMENT]] H2: None

  • Method Details

    • isApplicable

      boolean isApplicable()
      Hook for each implementation to have a chance to decide whether they apply. Typically, each QueryOptimizer would check whether it is applicable for the current database type.
      Returns:
      true if this hint should be applied to the query

    • getPreText

      String getPreText()
      Returns:
      Text to prepend before all hints

    • getPostText

      String getPostText()
      Returns:
      Text to append after all hints that use them

    • getSeparator

      String getSeparator()
      Returns:
      Text to place between two hints that return true in isWrapped().

    • shouldAppendComment

      boolean shouldAppendComment()
      Returns:
      true if this hint has a comment to add to the query

    • appendComment

      void appendComment(Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint comment. Only called if shouldAppendComment() returns true.

    • shouldAppendAfterSelect

      boolean shouldAppendAfterSelect()
      Returns:
      true if this hint should be appended after the SELECT keyword. Note that this hint has no effect if applied to the Table object returned by a join.

    • appendHintAfterSelect

      void appendHintAfterSelect(Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text after the SELECT keyword. Only called if shouldAppendAfterSelect() returns true.

    • shouldAppendInJoin

      boolean shouldAppendInJoin()
      Returns:
      true if this hint should be appended in the JOIN clause.

    • appendHintInJoin

      void appendHintInJoin(Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text inside the JOIN clause. Only called if shouldAppendInJoin() returns true.

    • shouldAppendAfterTable

      boolean shouldAppendAfterTable()
      Returns:
      true if this hint should be appended after the table in the FROM or JOIN clause.

    • appendHintAfterTable

      void appendHintAfterTable(Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text after the table in the FROM or JOIN clause. Only called if shouldAppendAfterTable() returns true.

    • shouldAppendAfterQuery

      boolean shouldAppendAfterQuery()
      Returns:
      true if this hint should be appended after the entire query String

    • appendHintAfterQuery

      void appendHintAfterQuery(Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text after the entire query String. Only called if shouldAppendAfterQuery() returns true.
